items.sentence: What Tom told us isn\'t very likely to be true.
Are you sure that it\'s OK to drink this water?
As far as I know, Tom has never been to Boston.
Tom doesn\'t know where he\'s going to do that.
Tom didn\'t tell me the reason why he was late.
Tom bragged about how well he could play chess.
Tom is going to get back from Boston on Monday.
Tom is going to get here earlier than expected.
Tom is going to learn how to drive this summer.
Tom is going to move back to Boston in October.
Tom certainly is good at making snap decisions.
Tom certainly seems to have learned his lesson.
Tom certainly spends a lot of money on jewelry.
Did you happen to see who was driving that car?
Did you have any idea that something was wrong?
That\'s a pretty big job to do all by yourself.
Tom gently kissed his daughter on the forehead.
We used to do that a lot when I was growing up.
Tom didn\'t like the answer that Mary gave him.
Tom didn\'t much like the way Mary treated him.
